556.19.text: The point about democracy is not instrumental.

559.87.text: It's not about the things that it brings.

562.66.text: The point about democracy is not that it delivers

565.22.text: legitimate, effective, prosperous rule of law.

571.47.text: It's not that it guarantees peace with itself or with its neighbors.

576.11.text: The point about democracy is intrinsic.

579.03.text: Democracy matters because it reflects an idea of equality

584.36.text: and an idea of liberty. It reflects an idea of dignity,

588.77.text: the dignity of the individual, the idea that each individual

592.64.text: should have an equal vote, an equal say,

596.24.text: in the formation of their government.
